reviews.text: The rooms in this hotel were big and beautiful! Fabulous shower and bath.

reviews.text: The location of the hotel was perfect if you want to spend your time in Old Montreal...walking distance to amazing restaurants and shops.

reviews.text: What can I say other than amazing! From the staff to the rooms to the location, this hotel is unbelievable! We stayed in the penthouse suite and it was absolute luxury from beginning to end. The staff,mainly Madeleine were A1! I highly recommend you treat yourself and book into this hotel. Thanks again!

reviews.title: Classy and just right

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff- so helpful and always greeted us with a smile. They were, by far, the most friendly staff we have encountered in a long time. The women were all gorgeous and the men looked like they just stepped out of GQ magazine! It was apparent that management maintains a high standard for appearance and professionalism here.
reviews.title: Great Staff; Very good hotel

reviews.text: My fiancée and I recently held two events at the Place D'Armes Hotel; our wedding ceremony and family gathering in the room Saint-Jacques, followed by cocktail and dinner with friends in the VIP Suite at Suite 701 restaurant two weeks later, and we could not have been happier with the events. Food was great, so was the service by the very enthousiastic and professional staff. We also booked two nights at the hotel, and were upgraded for both nights, which was a very pleasant surprise. Our experience at the RainSpa also enhanced our overall experience at this venue. We highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a classy venue for a wedding reception. Cristina & Alex, Montreal
reviews.title: wedding celebration

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights at the Place d'Armes hotel in the very heart of Old Montreal. Our Classic King Suite was a well appointed corner room with a nice city view. The location of this hotel is ideal - attractions of Old Montreal are within short walking distance as are many charming bars and bistros.
reviews.title: Perfectly located boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly from check-in through to check-out. My wife speaks some French which was certainly helpful but as an English-only guest I had no problems communicating with staff.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The chic bar downstairs is obviously a popular spot and serves a good range of cocktails, wines and beers as well as a selection of gourmet meals.
reviews.title: The Best Sleep Ever
Lovely stay in a great location!
reviews.text: Hubby and I decided to get away for our anniversary and had heard good things about this hotel.The room looked nice online and although a bit pricey,we decided to book our stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Let's start with the fact that I had messed up my reservation night and the Place along with every hotel in old town was sold out. As luck would have it a room opened up - but even if it hadn't the staff was working so hard to accommodate my wife and I we were so appreciative. We were so thrilled to get a room but the staff went further to assist us in getting checked-in and comfortable. Every interaction we had with was pleasant. This is the staff we all dream we had working at our business.
reviews.title: As great as the rooms are, the staff is even better

reviews.text: The hotel facilities are exceptional. We were in the building two in a superior king room and the design and amenities were all top shelf. Valet parking is quick and efficient and dining is relaxed and refreshing. If you are much younger than us the Suite 701 space turns into an upscale nightclub. If we were to change anything about the hotel it would be to have a quieter place for just an evening cocktail.
reviews.title: Profesionnalism & attention to details

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The tourist activities are a short distance away and comfortable walk for nearly anyone. It was a most enjoyable stay and we highly recommend the hotel to anyone wishing to visit the area.
reviews.title: 50/50 at best!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a business conference at HPA. Great room, excellent set-up. The personal was very available and quick to respond to every need. Easy access to 701 afterwards for cocktail with the group where the manager took really good care of our group. ! Thank you for everything
reviews.title: A gem!

reviews.text: I highly recommend it !
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location...

aka: Le Place d`Armes Hotel And Suites
description: Nestled in the heart of Old Montreal, Place d’Armes Hôtel & Suites welcomes you in a well-known neighborhood where historic architecture and modern luxury blend harmoniously. Place d’Armes Hôtel offers 133 rooms, including suites and penthouses.
